Name: Verify Investors Page after Search
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the investors section. Select A16zAndreessenHorowitz and perform a search. Verify the investors page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink investors vcs new > navigate to Page investors
step 3: At Page investors, click on hyperlink a16z andreessen horowitz > navigate to Page investors polychain-capital
step 4: At Page investors polychain-capital , click on button 2
step 5: At Page investors polychain-capital , click on button search > navigate to Page investors
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page investors

Name: Verify Polychain Capital Portfolio under A16z Andreessen Horowitz on Investors Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the investors section. Select A16zAndreessenHorowitz and view the Polychain Capital portfolio. Verify the Polychain Capital portfolio page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink investors vcs new > navigate to Page investors
step 3: At Page investors, click on hyperlink a16z andreessen horowitz > navigate to Page investors polychain-capital
step 4: At Page investors polychain-capital , click on hyperlink investor tabs item portfolio > navigate to Page investors polychain-capital portfolio
step 5: Add visual checkpoint at Page investors polychain-capital portfolio
